title: Virtual Scientist-Based Mathematical Inquiry: Museum STEM Informal Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning conducted in BYOD environments utilizing museum exhibition-linked mobile apps

learning_goals: Learners can interpret museum exhibits through mathematical modeling and apply them to real-world problems
Learners can visualize and interpret collected data using the analytical tools of the Dr. Discovery app
Learners can create statistical reports explaining museum visitor behavior patterns through collaborative projects
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
